title: Dyer's Record Book, 1884
creditline: Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts
description: Notebook with handwritten formulas for dyestuffs to be used for printing textiles.  Book contains 138 samples of cotton printed textiles.  Label on cover reads:  "LAWNS JAN. / 84".

tombstone.epitaph:
Dyer's Record Book, 1884.
1884. Medium: paper, cotton. Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts. 1945-55-5.
